verbs.description: [ARG0: The U.S. State Department] [V: aroused] [ARG1: anger and ridicule] [ARGM-CAU: for hosting a Facebook event on Tuesday that offered tips on traveling with children at a time when the Trump administration is under fire for its policy of separating immigrant parents and children] .
